alert.note: Alert for Inland Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 7:33PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bay and southeastern Washington Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 633 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vernon. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bradford, Wausau, Brock Crossroad, Orange Hill, Singer Road, Greenhead, Gilberts Mill, Porter Lake, Smyrna, Spring Hollow, Sunny Hills, Sylvania and Riverside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
